articles.author: Hermes Auto
articles.title: How Genting billionaire Lim Kok Thay's global cruise empire imploded in Hong Kong - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Mr Lim started a cruiseferry and gambling boat business in 1990s Hong Kong and turned it into one of Asia's biggest cruise operators.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
KUALA LUMPUR (BLOOMBERG) - Tycoon Lim Kok Thay started a cruise ferry and gambling boat business in 1990s Hong Kong and turned it into one of Asia's biggest cruise operators.
It was a labour of love… [+3194 chars]

articles.author: Jugjet Singh
articles.title: India thrash Malaysia 9-0 in Asia Cup - New Straits Times
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: As  expected, the Malaysian women’s hockey team were crushed 9-0 by Asia Cup defending champions India at the Sultan Qaboos Stadium in Muscat, Oman, today.

articles.title: CNA Documentary Sheds Light On Life In Changi Prison Through The Eyes Of 5 Inmates - Must Share News
articles.description: Channel NewsAsia (CNA) releases a documentary that sheds light on life in Changi Prison through the eyes of 5 inmates.
articles.content:
Prison life is equal part terrifying and mysterious. While we all know to avoid landing ourselves in one, not much else is known about the regimented lives inside these cells.
